projects.title: Doctor Appointment App
projects.description: A web application for scheduling doctor appointments.
projects.longDescription: This React application allows users to schedule, manage, and track doctor appointments. It features a user-friendly interface, calendar integration, and appointment management system.

projects.title: Car Showcase Web
projects.description: A modern web application for showcasing cars and their specifications.
projects.longDescription: Built with Next.js, this car showcase platform features detailed car listings, search functionality, filtering options, and responsive design for optimal viewing on all devices.

projects.title: Event Platform Web
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for managing and attending events.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js application provides event creation, registration, ticketing, and management features. It includes user profiles, event discovery, and interactive event schedules.

projects.title: MarketPlace Web
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce marketplace built with Laravel 10.
projects.longDescription: This marketplace platform allows vendors to create stores, list products, and process orders. It includes user authentication, product search, shopping cart, payment integration, and order management.

projects.title: Social Web
projects.description: A social networking platform built with Next.js.
projects.longDescription: This social media application features user profiles, posts, comments, likes, friend connections, and real-time notifications. It provides a responsive interface for seamless interaction across devices.

projects.title: Movie Website
projects.description: A movie browsing platform using external movie API.
projects.longDescription: This React application allows users to browse movies, view details, search for titles, and discover new releases. It integrates with a movie API to provide up-to-date information and media content.

projects.title: Chat App
projects.description: Real-time chat application with MERN stack and Socket.io.
projects.longDescription: This full-stack chat application features real-time messaging, user authentication, message history, and responsive design. Built with MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js, and Socket.io for real-time communication.

projects.title: Budget Web
projects.description: A personal finance and budget tracking application.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js application helps users track income, expenses, and savings goals. It includes budget categories, financial reports, and visualizations to help users manage their finances effectively.

projects.title: Desa Web
projects.description: A village information and management website.
projects.longDescription: This React application serves as an information portal and management system for a village. It includes news, events, public services information, and administrative features.

projects.title: HIMASIA Web
projects.description: Website for the Accounting Information Systems Student Association.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js website serves as the official platform for HIMASIA (Himpunan Mahasiswa Sistem Informasi Akuntansi). It features organization information, events, member profiles, and resources for students.

projects.title: Template Provider Web
projects.description: A platform offering web templates and themes for developers.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js application showcases and distributes web templates and themes. It includes template previews, documentation, and download functionality. (Ongoing project)

projects.title: Linktree Clone
projects.description: A personal link aggregator similar to Linktree.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js application serves as a personal link hub, allowing users to share multiple links through a single page. It features a clean, customizable interface and responsive design.

projects.title: Company Profile - Next.js
projects.description: A modern company profile website built with Next.js.
projects.longDescription: This Next.js application serves as a professional company profile, featuring about us, services, portfolio, team, and contact sections. It includes smooth animations and responsive design.

projects.title: Company Profile - Laravel 11
projects.description: A comprehensive company profile website built with Laravel 11.
projects.longDescription: This Laravel application provides a complete company profile solution with content management, blog functionality, service listings, and contact forms. It features a modern design and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: A visual clone of the Netflix landing page.
projects.longDescription: This project recreates the Netflix landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features responsive design, carousel functionality, and visual elements similar to the original Netflix interface.
